rows.name:
You'll be able to obtain various
items that will prove useful on your
adventures across the world of Alst.
New Quests for the Main Game

You can experience new stories that
expand on the main story of the game,
drawing on the Drivers' and Blades'
unique personalities.

All-new Rare Blades will be added.
You'll be able to get to know them
through their Blade Quests and
exploit their strengths in battle!

Aimed at players who long for an even
stiffer challenge. You'll be able to take
part in difficult new battles, and maybe
even make new friends along the way.
Entirely new story content is planned.

- Passion of the Artisan
- M.I.A. Nopon
- Industrial Sort of Tour
- Midnight Feasting
- The Lone Watchman

- Nopon of Good Tastes
- Cleared of All Charges
- Beneath the Aurora
- Upgrades and Tinkering
- Most Awful News?!

- War Chest Contribution from Bahn
- Super-Useful Pouch Item Sample
- Gift from Mr. Rurui
- Newbie Driver's Core Crystal Set

- Driver Essentials Set
- Upgrade Parts for Hana
- Homura's Favorite Thing
- Nia's Favorite Thing

- Driver Essentials Set 2
- Tora's Favorite Thing
- Hana JS's Favorite Thing
- Charming Driver Gear

- Upgrade Parts for Hana 2
- Driver Essentials Set 3

The Hanabuster is ready to serve!
To access him, finish the quest
"Shiny New Power".

- A Smith's Pastime
- A Hat Fit for a Lady
- Making Love Source
- A Mercenary's Honor
- Merclibay's Mightiest

This version adds the Challenge Battle
mode, and the option to toggle
auto-battles, special button challenge
inputs, and enemy aggression.

The long-awaited Challenge Battle
Mode is here! Fight alongside your new
friends Shulk and Fiorung and test your
skills with the toughest battles to date!
All Mysteries Will Be Made Clear

The story continues, 500 years later.
Where has Shin's path taken him? You
can find out as Rex, the hero of the
main Xenoblade Chronicles 2 game!

An original story set 500 years before
the events of Xenoblade Chronicles 2.
Discover the enigmatic pasts of Shin,
Metsu, and of course Hikari!

- Sunken Boosters
- The Trendy Patissier
- Artisanal Accessories
- Hot Spring Bonanza
- Mystery Launch Codes

Hibana is bursting with excitement
to finally meet you all! This Bitball-
wielding Fire-element girl comes in a
Core Crystal with a 100% resonance
rate, and is very eager to prove herself!

- New Difficulty Levels
Adds two difficulty levels,
"Bringer of Chaos" and "Custom".

An original story set 500 years before
the events of Xenoblade Chronicles 2,
expanding on the game's background
and featuring Shin, Iira's ringleader!

Meet Kamuya, an Uchigatana-toting
Light-element cool dude with a positive
attitude! He comes in a Core Crystal
with a 100% resonance rate, and can't
wait to find a place in your party.
